Articles.Content: Floor 947: It has pretty much oblitterated floor 946, there's also a strange creature on the corner of the room.
Floor 948: A giant sandwich. Let's eat!

Floor 949: You notice something odd when you open the stairwell door - it takes a moment for you to see it, but then you suddenly realize that the entire floor, including furniture, carpeting, light fixtures (which are all turned on), and even a running fish aquarium, has been completely encased in solid flint glass.
floor 950: you rinde a spaceship to floor 9001.

Floor 9001: A black hole takes you down to floor 951.

Floor 951: Filled with thick, black mud, but you have scuba gear on, so you swim to floor 952.
Floor 952: People scold Sun about his mud fetish.
Floor 953: Another floor encased in solid glass, this time with a young woman in a blue dress inside who, mysteriously, is moving as though through water.

floor 954: you see 42 s[pace marines coming down the stairs, you decide to wait in this security room. they kill the blue dress person, then realised she wasn't the annoying Disney character they were looking
Floor 955: The Kerbal Space Center!

Floor 956: IT'S A TRAP!!!

(you fall down to floor 1)

Floor 957: You got back up using the HypeTrain, where you find this floor is full of a model railway!

(how fitting?)
Floor 958: There's a train here of American origin, but it says 'CN' on the side... you wonder what it is...

Floor 959: You enter a room with capsules filled with a liquid, they seem to have different species of creatures inside of them, 2 black-dressed man armed with M4A1s tell you to "Not say anything or your family dies", they escort you to floor 960.

960: You take a giant space elevator to floor 1234567890987654321.

1234567890987654321. IT'S ANOTHER TRAP! (you fall down to floor 1)
It's a space elevator, not an elevator, so it does not break the rules.
Floor 961: a rule states that one cannot go down, and must keep going up, no matter the vehicle.

Floor 962:

You take a giant space elevator to floor 1234567890987654321.
Floor 963: There's another rule here stating that you must ascend one floor at a time.

Floor 964: There is a button that says: Press to delete the rules. Someone presses it.

:D :D

Floor 964: There is a button that says: Press to delete the rules. Someone presses it.

:D :D

HOW ABOUT NO.

Floor 965: You find an old Bi-Plane that is leaking fuel right next to an oven someone forgot to turn off. You hurry up to the next floor.

Floor 966: This floor is very tall and spacious, and has a little hand-cranked cable-climber attached to a black carbon nanotube ribbon suspended in its center, which you climb onto and use to winch yourself up nearly three kilometers before arriving at the next floor.
967: Um... I can't see anything!
968. Welcome to the never-ending smiley room :d :d
970: Aaaaaaaaaaaaah!!!!!!!!! Epilepsy attack!!!!!!!!!! Seizure!!!!!!!!!!!
